|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(cvol)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
-| diffsc(hs1, co(cv(hs2), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(`' c0 " c1)∈ dom(vol))
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
⊣ d(hs1,(hs2[+](i[×]hs3)))

body.origin: |- diffsc(hs1, co(cv(hs2), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(cvol)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(`' c0 " c1)∈ dom(vol))
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)

comment: The preimage of any open set (in the complex topology) under a measurable function is measurable. (See also ~ cncombf , which explains why ` A e. dom vol ` is too weak a condition for this theorem.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
